Press & Media</h1>

Welcome to the Press and Media section of the website. Here you will find all of the latest news and press releases about the Edinburgh University Music Society's activities and events.</p>

If you have a specific press enquiry or require images for your publication, logos, press releases and requests for press tickets, please contact our Secretary at secretary@eums.org.uk</a>.</p>

Contact the Committee</h4>

If you wish to directly contact one of the other members of our committee then please find all details of the current committee in this document</a>.</p>

News Releases</h4>

If you wish to be kept updated please subscribe to our twice-monthly newsletter ad.lib</em>. Sign up here</a>.</p>

For all recent news items please go to our News page</a>.</strong></p>
